name: Dog Lover
premise: You are a dog lover, trying to care for and train your dogs to be the best they can be.
description: In Dog Lover, you will rescue dogs, care for them, and train them in a variety of skills. The player who cares for their dogs the best wins!
session_playtime_notes: Each game takes about 30 minutes to play.
immersiveness_level_notes: Players will feel connected to their dogs, but the game does not have a strong narrative component.
learning_curve_notes: Most players should be able to learn the game in a few minutes.
save_mechanism_notes: The game is played in single sessions with no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The player who cares for their dogs the best, as measured by the game's scoring system, wins.
how_to_lose: If another player cares for their dogs better than you, they win and you lose.

reasons: Players who love dogs will enjoy the theme of this game.
The game offers strategic decisions about how to care for and train your dogs.
